com.students.testapp.controller

Class ContentFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.students.testapp.controller.ContentFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class ContentFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    Fragment, that aggregates main content (students from database). It controls fetching data from server, loading it to the database and show all data in the recycle view.
    Author:
    Andrii Chernysh. E-mail : itcherry97@gmail.com
